New Records: Kai Havertz will start as a striker for Germany against France, marking a positional change and potential new record opportunities
Key Match Events: Kai Havertz's positional switch to striker and Maximilian Mittelstadt's debut at left-back are key events for the match
Pre-Game Insights: Julian Nagelsmann confirmed Kai Havertz will play as a striker, highlighting his confidence in his abilities and team strategy; Manuel Neuer will miss the match due to injury but remains the first-choice goalkeeper for Euro 2024
